FuncDef:
The terminal alarm command enables the device to send alarms to a terminal.
The undo terminal alarm command disables the device from sending alarms to a terminal. The terminal alarm command enables the device to send alarms to a terminal. The undo terminal alarm command disables the device from sending alarms to a terminal. By default, the Router is enabled to send alarms to a terminal.
ExtraInfo:
The terminal alarm command is used to control whether to send alarms to a terminal.
By default, the Router is enabled to send alarms to the terminal. To prevent alarms in device maintenance, run the undo terminal alarm command to disable the Router from sending alarms to a terminal.
